name: Merry Little Heart
description: This is a miniature version of Rustic Little Heart, and would make a cute Christmas tree ornament. It uses a very small amount of DK or Sport weight yarn. Any other yarn weight may be used, but may affect resulting size.
full_text: This is a miniature version of Rustic Little Heart , and would make a cute Christmas tree ornament. It uses a very small amount of DK or Sport weight yarn. Any other yarn weight may be used, but may affect resulting size. It is knit from the bottom point up. Once the center diamond is complete, a semi circle is worked on each side of the top to complete the shape. Enjoy!
